flavorText: Bantians believe those who are born into the highest caste and live a life of discipline and virtue can ascend to become angels.

foreignData.flavorText: Bantianer glauben, dass Angehörige der höchsten Kaste zu Engeln werden können, wenn sie Disziplin und Tugend vorleben.
foreignData.name: Unbesiegbare Hymne
foreignData.text: Zähle die Karten in deiner Bibliothek. Dein Lebenspunktestand wird zu dieser Zahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Los bantianos creen que aquellos nacidos en las castas más altas y que viven una vida de disciplina y virtud pueden ascender y convertirse en ángeles.
foreignData.name: Himno invencible
foreignData.text: Cuenta la cantidad de cartas en tu biblioteca. Tu total de vidas se convierte en ese número.

foreignData.flavorText: Les Bantiens croient que ceux qui naissent de la caste supérieure et qui vouent leur vie à la discipline et la vertu s'élèvent pour devenir des anges.
foreignData.name: Hymne invincible
foreignData.text: Comptez le nombre de cartes de votre bibliothèque. Votre total de point de vie devient égal à ce nombre.

foreignData.flavorText: I Bantiani credono che quanti sono nati nella casta più alta e trascorrono una vita di virtù e disciplina possono ascendere fino a diventare angeli.
foreignData.name: Inno Invincibile
foreignData.text: Conta il numero di carte nel tuo grimorio. I tuoi punti vita diventano quel numero.

foreignData.flavorText: バント人は、最も高い階級に生まれ、規律と美徳を身に付けて育った者が、天に召されて天使になると信じている。
foreignData.name: 無敵の賛歌
foreignData.text: あなたのライブラリーのカードの枚数を数える。 あなたのライフの総量はその数になる。

foreignData.flavorText: Os bantianos acreditam que aqueles que nascem nas castas mais elevadas e vivem uma vida de disciplina e virtude alcançam a ascensão e se tornam anjos.
foreignData.name: Hino Invencível
foreignData.text: Conte o número de cards no seu grimório. Aquele número se torna seu total de pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Обитатели Бэнта верят рожденные в наивысшей касте и ведущие строгий и праведный образ жизни могут стать ангелами.
foreignData.name: Непобедимый Гимн
foreignData.text: Посчитайте количество карт в вашей библиотеке. Количество ваших жизней становится равным этому числу.

foreignData.flavorText: 班特人相信出生时就属于最高等种姓、遵照纪律与美德过活的人，可以升华为天使。
foreignData.name: 不屈赞歌
foreignData.text: 计算你牌库中的牌数量。 你的总生命成为该数量。

name: Invincible Hymn
originalText: Count the number of cards in your library. Your life total becomes that number.

rulings.text: Invincible Hymn checks the number of cards in your library just once: when it resolves. It doesn’t continuously modify your life total as your library size changes.

For your life total to become the appropriate number, you actually gain or lose the necessary amount of life. For example, if your life total is 20 and your library has thirty-two cards in it when Invincible Hymn resolves, Invincible Hymn will cause you to gain 12 life. Other cards that interact with life gain or life loss will interact with Invincible Hymn accordingly.

In a Two-Headed Giant game, Invincible Hymn will essentially set your team’s life total to the number of cards in your library. For example, suppose your team has 8 life and you have thirty cards in your library. Your life total (being the same as your team’s life total) changes from 8 life to 30 life, for a net gain of 22 life. Your team’s life total becomes 30 (22 + 8).

text: Count the number of cards in your library. Your life total becomes that number.
